result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 28, 2022 at 01:20 pm.

10:00 AM Defendant Mulugeta J Johnson not in court.  Attorney Jacob A Idlas in court for Mulugeta J Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Hector Al-Homsi in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defense indicated defendant is currently at WMHI, requested adjournment.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 01:20 pm.
Motion and Demand for Discovery and Notice of DNA and Witness List- State of Wisconsin

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Brian J or Claire J except only by telephone or in writing.
- Defendant shall not be in the 400 block of Linden St in Verona.
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with any minor child of Brian J or Claire J. 
Trial Judge - Br 13

1:56 PM Defendant Mulugeta B Johnson in court, in custody via Zoom.  Attorney Devonte D Windham in court for Mulugeta B Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Lillian Rose Nelson in court for the State of Wisconsin. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.
Status conference scheduled for October 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
